products.title: Wow Factor, Silver Crackle - Venetian Blind
products.description: The brushed silver wow factor in silver crackle is a striking, lightly textured venetian blind, crafted from heavy gauge aluminium, and with a soft, crackled effect on the surface. Use the pull-cord to adjust the slats at ease, allowing as much or as little light as you like to filter through. The attractive industriousness of the silver crackle makes for the perfect accent to a retro kitchen in a monochrome colour scheme.

products.title: Pvc Blackout Stone Roller Blind
products.description: There's elegance in simplicity and nowhere is that showcased better than this pvc stone roller blind. A stylish shade of grey that's right on trend, it'll give your home a sophisticated new look. While this roller will look great anywhere, the bathroom is where it really excels.

products.description: Granite madera describes this faux wooden blind perfectly. Its got the look of real wood thanks to the grain effect, whilst the advanced polymer slats make it one hard working cookie. Its perfect for any room, from hot and humid bathrooms to soft and sumptuous lounges. What granite madera describes this faux wooden blind perfectly.

products.description: Their voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. Voile fr moondust grey is a semi-translucent stylish, dark grey 127mm vertical and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen, bathroom or bedroom will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in this modern grey shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame retardant and pollergen-coated, makes this sheer 127mm vertical blind a fantastic addition to your living space.

products.description: Their basix plain range is simple and effective method of freshening up your decor. This dark grey 127mm vertical blind is a modern grey shade, made of durable fabric, and stylish 5 inch vanes. Updating your window blind is a simple way to update the room, and dark grey is an easy colour to mix and match accessories with. Part of their pollergen-coated fabrics, this blind is fantastic in high-pollen seasons as its fabric is pollen-resistant, making this a great blind for hay-fever sufferers.

products.title: Moda Blackout Stone Grey Roller Blind

The beauty of the colourway, with its flecks and weaves, is that it is so easy to pair with the a lovely neutral grey tone with a stunning textured finish, this moda stone grey fabric is really upping the ante in the designer stakes.

products.description: Whether you're looking for something warming and homely or smart and contemporary, this moda warm grey will fit the bill. products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Castle Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: A classic grey shade, the castle grey satin from the ecowood deluxe range is a cool and contemporary venetian blind, carefully crafted from durable faux wood that mimics the real thing perfectly. The look is finished off with coordinating linen ladders for easy adjustments. Grey looks good with anything, but the castle grey satin will look especially striking when used as part of a light and airy, white monochrome colour scheme, perfect for a home office or study.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Chic Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The plush sheen of the ecowood deluxe's chic grey satin is modest and understated, with a polished feel and a smooth finish. Matching designer ladder ribbons, as well as pelmet and bottom rail, make the look whole. Craft a chic and contemporary haven in your master bedroom by blending the chic grey satin with pale, lemon yellow walls and matching grey trim. Include pretty florals featuring coordinating shades of yellow and grey, and don't forget to add plenty of luxe fabrics for extra cosiness.

products.title: Amor Washed Pebble Roller Blind
products.description: Ambiguity is the keyword with the washed pebble. It is so ambiguous we genuinely have no idea what colour it is. Somewhere on the grey/beige spectrum, it seems to sit around halfway giving it the remarkable ability to blend with a variety of decor styles. Placed amongst bolder colours like blues, reds or yellows, it acts to calm them down and make the room less overwhelming, whereas placing it with more earthy tones gives the room a neutral accent that sticks with grabs your attention.

products.title: Amor Dolphin Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Add a darker grey tone to your room with the amor dolphin grey blackout roller blind. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms.
